info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 6 at 8:45AM EDT until April 9 at 6:54AM EDT by NWS Charleston WV
info.description:
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in West Virginia...Ohio...
Ohio River At Racine Lock affecting Jackson, Meigs and Mason Counties.
For the Ohio River...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Ohio River at Racine Lock.
* WHEN...From this afternoon to Wednesday morning.
* IMPACTS...At 41.0 feet, Ohio State Route 124 at Antiquity starts to flood. Areas of Ravenswood are flooded upstream from Racine Lock. At 42.0 feet, Ohio Route 124 near Minersville is flooded. At 44.0 feet, West Virginia Route 62 is flooded just below Racine Lock at West Creek. More areas along Ohio Route 124 are flooded.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 AM EDT Sunday the stage was 37.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this afternoon to a crest of 43.7 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage early Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 41.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 42.7 feet on 03/03/2021. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Report flooding to the National Weather Service by calling toll free, 800 401 9535, when you can do so safely.
Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/rlx.
The next statement will be issued this evening at 845 PM EDT.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO WEDNESDAY MORNING

area.areaDesc: Meigs, OH; Jackson, WV; Mason, WV
